page.title: 19Fears For The Future
page.content: Our class of 30 pupils conducted a survey of parents into what their fears were for the the future and this is what they said.Some feared that alens would take over the world, Nuclear weapons would destroy the world and the standard of living would get worse.Unemployment would get worse because of advanced machinery .They also feared that there would be no solution to the Ulster problem.That our natural resorses would become exhausted and that the environment would be destroyed through manufacture of Nuclear reactions, over population might lead to starvation and that there might be more young people taking drugs.
